Skip to content
Reen

About II

Team Member with Columns Block

Block Navigation

  • Add Columns block and set the number of columns as 2.
  • In first column, add section, header and paragraph block.
  • In second column, add Team Member block as inner block.

Team Member Settings

For more details please visit Team Member.

Output

Icon Block

Block Navigation

Section settings

  • Enter your block heading by using Section Block and put “inner-top inner-bottom-sm” on Section Inner Class.
  • Set the background color as Green, upload background image and set overlay as Image Bg Soft.
  • Then add Icon Block as an inner block.

Icon Block Settings

For more details please visit Icon Block.

Output

Hero Slider

Block Navigation

Section & Columns settings

  • Enter your block heading by using Section Block and put “inner” on Section Inner Class.
  • Add Columns block as an inner block and set No of columns to 1.
  • On Columns block set column width as 10 on lg screen.
  • Then add Hero Slider as an inner block of column.

Hero Slider Settings

For more details please visit Hero Slider.

Output

Group Columns Block

Block Navigation

Group & Columns settings

  • Add Group block and put the Section ID “reasons“.
  • Add Columns block as inner block of group block.
  • Set the number of columns as 4.
  • Add heading and paragraph block for each column as like block navigation.

Output

Call to action

Settings

For more details please visit Call To Action.

Output
